==Trivia==
* Abagnale's name is a reference to American author and convicted felon {{W|Frank Abagnale}}, whose autobiography ''{{W|Catch Me If You Can (book)|Catch Me If You Can}}'' is the inspiration for the Steven Spielberg's 2002 film of the same name.
